description:
Raoh unleashes a fierce fighting spirit. Enveloped within it, Kenshiro tells Raoh that each of their next blows will both be their last.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu frères du Hokuto ! Vous êtes allés au bout de l`amour et de la tristesse !!
Farewell, the Brothers of the North Star! They`re Beyond Love and Sorrow!!
Saraba Hokuto 2 Kyoudai! Ima Futari wa Ai to Kanashimi no Hate ni!!
さらば北斗2兄弟! いま2人は愛と哀しみの果てに!!
